properties.entry: SELECT CNTS_NO , CNTS_NAME , CNTS_DATE , CNTS_URL , CHANGE_NAME FROM CONTEST C JOIN UPLOAD ON (CNTS_NO = UPL_NO) WHERE C.DEL_STATUS = 'N' AND CNTS_DATE > SYSDATE ORDER BY CNTS_DATE
SELECT CNTS_NO , CNTS_NAME , CNTS_DATE , CNTS_URL , CHANGE_NAME FROM CONTEST JOIN UPLOAD ON (CNTS_NO = UPL_NO) WHERE CNTS_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM ENTRY_LIST JOIN CONTEST_CHALLENGE ON (CNTS_CHLG_NO = CHLG_NO_INLIST) WHERE CHLG_ENTRY_ID = ? AND CNTS_CHLG_DATE > SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM ENTRY_LIST JOIN CONTEST_CHALLENGE ON (CNTS_CHLG_NO = CHLG_NO_INLIST) WHERE CHLG_ENTRY_ID = ? AND CNTS_CHLG_DATE < SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM NENTRY_LIST JOIN NORMAL_CHALLENGE ON (NOR_CHLG_NO = NCHLG_NO_INLIST) WHERE NCHLG_ENTRY_ID = ? AND NOR_CHLG_DATE > SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM NENTRY_LIST JOIN NORMAL_CHALLENGE ON (NOR_CHLG_NO = NCHLG_NO_INLIST) WHERE NCHLG_ENTRY_ID = ? AND NOR_CHLG_DATE < SYSDATE

SELECT CNTS_CHLG_NO , CNTS_CHLG_TITLE , CNTS_CHLG_CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , CNTS_CHLG_DATE , CNTS_CHLG_MAX , CNTS_CHLG_ID , CNTS_NAME , CNTS_NO , CHANGE_NAME FROM CONTEST_CHALLENGE C JOIN CONTEST T USING (CNTS_NO) JOIN ENTRY_LIST E ON (CHLG_NO_INLIST = CNTS_CHLG_NO) LEFT JOIN UPLOAD U ON (CNTS_CHLG_NO = UPL_NO) WHERE E.CHLG_ENTRY_ID = ? AND C.DEL_STATUS = 'N' AND C.RPR_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT NOR_CHLG_TITLE , ENROLL_DATE , NOR_CHLG_DATE , NOR_CHLG_MAX , NOR_CHLG_ID , LOCAL_NAME FROM NORMAL_CHALLENGE JOIN LOCAL ON (NOR_CHLG_LOCAL = LOCAL_NO) JOIN NENTRY_LIST ON (NCHLG_NO_INLIST = NOR_CHLG_NO) WHERE NCHLG_ENTRY_ID = ? AND DEL_STATUS = 'N' AND RPR_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT CNTS_CHLG_NO , CNTS_CHLG_TITLE , CNTS_CHLG_CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , CNTS_CHLG_DATE , CNTS_CHLG_MAX , CNTS_CHLG_ID , CNTS_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(CHLG_ENTRY_ID) FROM ENTRY_LIST WHERE CHLG_NO_INLIST = CNTS_CHLG_NO) COUNT FROM CONTEST_CHALLENGE C JOIN CONTEST USING (CNTS_NO) LEFT JOIN UPLOAD ON (CNTS_CHLG_NO = UPL_NO) WHERE C.DEL_STATUS = 'N' AND C.RPR_STATUS = 'N' AND CNTS_NO = ? AND CNTS_CHLG_DATE > SYSDATE ORDER BY 1 DESC
SELECT LOCAL_NO , LOCAL_NAME FROM LOCAL

SELECT NOR_CHLG_NO , NOR_CHLG_TITLE , NOR_CHLG_CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , NOR_CHLG_DATE , NOR_CHLG_MAX , NOR_CHLG_ID , LOCAL_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(NCHLG_ENTRY_ID) FROM NENTRY_LIST WHERE NCHLG_NO_INLIST = NOR_CHLG_NO) COUNT FROM NORMAL_CHALLENGE N JOIN LOCAL ON (NOR_CHLG_LOCAL = LOCAL_NO) LEFT JOIN UPLOAD ON (NOR_CHLG_NO = UPL_NO) WHERE N.DEL_STATUS = 'N' AND N.RPR_STATUS = 'N' AND NOR_CHLG_DATE > SYSDATE ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT NOR_CHLG_NO , NOR_CHLG_TITLE , NOR_CHLG_CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , NOR_CHLG_DATE , NOR_CHLG_MAX , NOR_CHLG_ID , LOCAL_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(NCHLG_ENTRY_ID) FROM NENTRY_LIST WHERE NCHLG_NO_INLIST = NOR_CHLG_NO) COUNT FROM NORMAL_CHALLENGE N JOIN LOCAL ON (NOR_CHLG_LOCAL = LOCAL_NO) LEFT JOIN UPLOAD ON (NOR_CHLG_NO = UPL_NO) WHERE N.DEL_STATUS = 'N' AND N.RPR_STATUS = 'N' AND LOCAL_NO = ? AND NOR_CHLG_DATE > SYSDATE ORDER BY 1 DESC
INSERT INTO CONTEST ( CNTS_NO , CNTS_NAME , CNTS_DATE , CNTS_URL , DEL_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNTS_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') , ? , DEFAULT )
INSERT INTO UPLOAD ( UPL_ID , UPL_MENU , UPL_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , VER_STATUS , DEL_STATUS ) VALUES ( ? , ? , SEQ_CNTS_NO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT )
UPDATE CONTEST SET DEL_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE CNTS_NO = ?

INSERT INTO CONTEST_CHALLENGE ( CNTS_CHLG_NO , CNTS_CHLG_TITLE , CNTS_CHLG_CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , CNTS_CHLG_DATE , CNTS_CHLG_MAX , CNTS_CHLG_ID , CNTS_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHLG_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO UPLOAD ( UPL_ID , UPL_MENU , UPL_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , VER_STATUS , DEL_STATUS ) VALUES ( ? , ? , SEQ_CHLG_NO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT )
UPDATE CONTEST_CHALLENGE SET DEL_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE CNTS_CHLG_NO = ?
UPDATE NORMAL_CHALLENGE SET DEL_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE NOR_CHLG_NO = ?
INSERT INTO ENTRY_LIST ( CHLG_NO_INLIST , CHLG_ENTRY_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHLG_NO.CURRVAL , ? )
INSERT INTO ENTRY_LIST ( CHLG_NO_INLIST , CHLG_ENTRY_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? )
SELECT CHLG_NO_INLIST , CHLG_ENTRY_ID , MEM_NICK FROM ENTRY_LIST JOIN MEMBER ON (CHLG_ENTRY_ID = MEM_ID) WHERE CHLG_NO_INLIST = ?
DELETE FROM ENTRY_LIST WHERE CHLG_NO_INLIST = ? AND CHLG_ENTRY_ID = ?
SELECT CHLG_NO_INLIST , CHLG_ENTRY_ID FROM ENTRY_LIST WHERE CHLG_NO_INLIST = ? AND CHLG_ENTRY_ID = ?

INSERT INTO NORMAL_CHALLENGE ( NOR_CHLG_NO , NOR_CHLG_TITLE , NOR_CHLG_CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , NOR_CHLG_DATE , NOR_CHLG_MAX , NOR_CHLG_ID , NOR_CHLG_LOCAL ) VALUES ( SEQ_NCHLG_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , SYSDATE , TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO NENTRY_LIST ( NCHLG_NO_INLIST , NCHLG_ENTRY_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_NCHLG_NO.CURRVAL , ? )
INSERT INTO UPLOAD ( UPL_ID , UPL_MENU , UPL_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , VER_STATUS , DEL_STATUS ) VALUES ( ? , ? , SEQ_NCHLG_NO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT )
SELECT NCHLG_NO_INLIST , NCHLG_ENTRY_ID FROM NENTRY_LIST WHERE NCHLG_NO_INLIST = ? AND NCHLG_ENTRY_ID = ?
INSERT INTO NENTRY_LIST ( NCHLG_NO_INLIST , NCHLG_ENTRY_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? )
DELETE FROM NENTRY_LIST WHERE NCHLG_NO_INLIST = ? AND NCHLG_ENTRY_ID = ?
SELECT NCHLG_NO_INLIST , NCHLG_ENTRY_ID , MEM_NICK FROM NENTRY_LIST JOIN MEMBER ON (NCHLG_ENTRY_ID = MEM_ID) WHERE NCHLG_NO_INLIST = ?

SELECT NOR_CHLG_NO , NOR_CHLG_TITLE , NOR_CHLG_CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , NOR_CHLG_DATE , NOR_CHLG_MAX , NOR_CHLG_ID , LOCAL_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(NCHLG_ENTRY_ID) FROM NENTRY_LIST WHERE NCHLG_NO_INLIST = NOR_CHLG_NO) COUNT FROM NORMAL_CHALLENGE N JOIN LOCAL ON (NOR_CHLG_LOCAL = LOCAL_NO) JOIN UPLOAD ON (NOR_CHLG_NO = UPL_NO) WHERE N.DEL_STATUS = 'N' AND N.RPR_STATUS = 'N' AND NOR_CHLG_DATE > SYSDATE AND NOR_CHLG_LOCAL = ? ORDER BY 1 DESC
